name: The Choice (ayyshush, Vajaskenyer13, X.lib)
description:
This is a small narrative game made for Blackthornprod game jam.

There are some easter eggs, feel free to comment if you end up finding them. 

The movement keys are A and D alongside mouse clicks for the UI elements. 

Even though we have a short credit video in the end, I'll still give them here.

Vajaskenyer13

Xlib

Meet the voice actors and the rest of the people on our discord!!

https://discord.gg/3w2dchkRxb
